info.title: CoAP Proxy API
info.description: OpenAPI spec for the CoAP-to-HTTP proxy endpoints

post.summary: Receives temperature data from a sensor
post.description:
Accepts temperature data from a meteostation sensor. Requires a sensorId and temperature value.

Example payload:
```json
{
  "sensorId": "station-001",
  "temperature": 22.5
}
```

post.summary: Receives wind speed and direction from a sensor
post.description:
Accepts wind data from a meteostation sensor. Requires a sensorId, speed, and direction.

Example payload:
```json
{
  "sensorId": "station-001",
  "speed": 5.2,
  "direction": 270
}
```
